name: df-cref
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0
body: |- wceq(ccref(c0), crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), c0), wbr(cv(s2), cref, cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define a statement "every open cover has an ` A ` refinement" , where ` A ` is a property for refinements like "finite", "countable", "point finite" or "locally finite". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jan-2020.)
